thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Kyle Desmond
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kyle Desmond

author: Kyle Desmond
title: Kyle Desmond
text: I came in without an appointment to have a tire patched. Much to my surprise the tire wasn't salvageable. Chris at the front desk was sympathetic to my situation and helped me to a quick resolution for a great price. I was extremely satisfied with the customer service and I was in and out within an hour. Great experience, excellent customer service, speedy and accurate solutions. I highly recommend if you live in the Vernon area and will be returning in the future for any of my tire needs.
